items.headline: PepsiCo’s revenue grows, as higher prices offset a continued drop in beverage volumes
items.summary_en: PepsiCo saw an earnings beat and an improved full-year outlook, even as beverage volumes in North America extended their long streak of declines.

items.headline: The bull market is turning 3 years old. Here’s where stocks are likely headed next.
items.summary_en: What began as a tech-driven rally has started to broaden out. According to some on Wall Street, that should help power indexes like the S&P 500 even higher.

items.headline: Delta’s stock jumps as travel demand accelerates, leads to record revenue

items.headline: Google is looking to lock in an AI advantage with this move

items.headline: Here’s what the OpenAI-AMD deal says about Nvidia
items.summary_en: OpenAI says it’s buying AMD chips to get more compute power. Analysts also see benefits to diversifying away from Nvidia and likely securing favorable pricing.
